sp_theme.name: loaner theme

sys_update_version.name: sp_theme_dc752e1a83162210def956d6feaad312
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_theme"><sp_theme action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css_variables>:root {
  /* === Navbar === */
  --navbar-bg: #FFFFFF;                    /* Navbar background */
  --navbar-divider: #415A77;              /* Divider line */
  --navbar-link: #F1F3F5;                 /* Link text color */
  --navbar-link-hover: #00B4D8;           /* Link hover color */

  /* === Branding === */
  --brand-color: #00B4D8;                 /* Logo / brand accent */

  /* === Backgrounds === */
  --page-bg: #F1F3F5;                     /* General page background */
  --panel-bg: #FFFFFF;                    /* Panels / cards / sections */

  /* === Buttons & UI === */
  --button-default-bg: #415A77;          /* Neutral button background */
  --primary-color: #00B4D8;              /* Primary / CTA color */
  --success-color: #90EE90;              /* Success state (lime green) */
  --info-color: #00B4D8;                 /* Info state, matches primary */
  --warning-color: #FFA500;              /* Warning state (orange) */
  --danger-color: #FF4C4C;               /* Error/danger state */

  /* === Text Colors === */
  --text-main: #1B263B;                  /* Primary text */
  --text-success: #2E8B57;               /* Success-related text */
  --text-muted: #6C757D;                 /* Low-emphasis text */
  --link-color: #00B4D8;                 /* Hyperlinks */
}
</css_variables><footer/><footer_fixed>false</footer_fixed><header display_value="Loaner Hub Header">83bde2d283562210def956d6feaad38b</header><name>loaner theme</name><navbar_fixed>false</navbar_fixed><sys_class_name>sp_theme</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-25 05:01:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>dc752e1a83162210def956d6feaad312</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>loaner theme</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_1474716_lva">380367a183a12210def956d6feaad394</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">380367a183a12210def956d6feaad394</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_theme_dc752e1a83162210def956d6feaad312</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-25 05:43:01</sys_updated_on><turn_off_scss_compilation>false</turn_off_scss_compilation></sp_theme></record_update>
